languages.text: {n}Каллигос отворачивается и замечает, наконец, покрытого кровью архмилитанта. Взгляд слуги приводит его в замешательство.{/n} "Что с твоими глазами, Вортен?". {n}Архмилитант исступленно скалится, обнажив клыки. Спустя несколько мгновений тишины Каллигос рассеянно отводит взгляд.{/n} "О чем это мы? Ах да, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}. Я уже говорил, что твои обвинения беспочвенны?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Каллигос отворачивается и замечает, наконец, покрытого кровью архмилитанта. Взгляд слуги приводит его в замешательство.{/n} "Что с твоими глазами, Вортен?". {n}Архмилитант исступленно скалится, обнажив клыки. Спустя несколько мгновений тишины Каллигос рассеянно отводит взгляд.{/n} "О чем это мы? Ах да, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}. Я уже говорил, что твои обвинения беспочвенны?"

languages.text: {n}Calligos turns around and finally notices the blood-covered Arch-Militant. Something about his servant seems to have puzzled him.{/n} "What's wrong with your eyes, Worten?" {n}The Arch-Militant bares his fangs rabidly. After several moments of silence, Calligos absent-mindedly looks away,{/n} "Where were we? Ah, yes, new blood. Have I already told you that your accusations are baseless?"
languages.original_text: {n}Каллигос отворачивается и замечает, наконец, покрытого кровью архмилитанта. Взгляд слуги приводит его в замешательство.{/n} "Что с твоими глазами, Вортен?". {n}Архмилитант исступленно скалится, обнажив клыки. Спустя несколько мгновений тишины Каллигос рассеянно отводит взгляд.{/n} "О чем это мы? Ах да, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}. Я уже говорил, что твои обвинения беспочвенны?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos turns away and finally notices the blood-covered Arch-militant. The gaze of his servant confuses him.{/n} "What's wrong with your eyes, Worten?" {n}The Arch-militant gives a frenzied grin, baring his fangs. After several moments of silence, Calligos absentmindedly turns his eyes away,{/n} "Where were we? Ah, yes, New blood. Have I already told you that your accusations are baseless?"

languages.text: {n}Calligos se gira y por fin ve al ensangrentado Archimilitante. Algo en el aspecto de su sirviente le confunde.{/n} «¿Qué te pasa en los ojos, Worten?». {n}El Archimilitante, rabioso, le enseña los colmillos. Al cabo de unos instantes de silencio, Calligos aparta la mirada con gesto distraído.{/n} «¿Por dónde íbamos? Ah, sí, {mf|el novato|la novata}. ¿Le he dicho ya que sus acusaciones son infundadas?».
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos turns around and finally notices the blood-covered Arch-Militant. Something about his servant seems to have puzzled him.{/n} "What's wrong with your eyes, Worten?" {n}The Arch-Militant bares his fangs rabidly. After several moments of silence, Calligos absent-mindedly looks away,{/n} "Where were we? Ah, yes, new blood. Have I already told you that your accusations are baseless?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos se da la vuelta y por fin ve al ensangrentado archimilitante. La mirada de su sirviente le confunde.{/n} «¿Qué te pasa en los ojos, Worten?». {n}El archimilitante le mira con el rostro desencajado por una sonrisa que expone sus colmillos. Al cabo de unos instantes de silencio, Calligos aparta la mirada con gesto distraído.{/n} «¿Por dónde íbamos? Ah, sí, {mf|el novato|la novata}. ¿Le he dicho ya que sus acusaciones son infundadas?».

languages.text: {n}卡里戈斯转过了身，终于注意到了浑身是血的首席战士。这位仆人的模样似乎让他感到困惑不已。{/n}“你的眼睛怎么了，沃尔腾？”{n}首席战士癫狂般地露出了尖牙。卡里戈斯沉默片刻之后，心不在焉地移开了目光。{/n}“刚刚说到哪儿了？对了，新来的。我有没有告诉过你，你的指控没有任何根据？”
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos turns around and finally notices the blood-covered Arch-Militant. Something about his servant seems to have puzzled him.{/n} "What's wrong with your eyes, Worten?" {n}The Arch-Militant bares his fangs rabidly. After several moments of silence, Calligos absent-mindedly looks away,{/n} "Where were we? Ah, yes, new blood. Have I already told you that your accusations are baseless?"

traits.locale_text: {n}卡里戈斯转过了身，终于注意到了浑身是血的首席战士。首席战士的目光让他感到迷惑不解。{/n}“你的眼睛怎么了，沃尔腾？”{n}首席战士疯狂地咧嘴一笑，露出尖牙。卡里戈斯沉默片刻之后，心不在焉地移开了目光。{/n}“刚刚说到哪儿了？对了，新来的。我有没有告诉过你，你的指控没有任何根据？”

languages.text: {n}Calligos se détourne et remarque enfin l'archimilitant couvert de sang. Quelque chose dans le regard de son serviteur semble le rendre perplexe.{/n} « Que t'arrive-t-il, Worten ? Tes yeux sont étranges. » {n}L'archimilitant montre les dents comme un animal enragé. Après quelques instants de silence, Calligos regarde ailleurs, l'air absent :{/n} « Où en étions-nous ? Ah, oui... Novice, vous ai-je déjà dit que vos accusations étaient infondées ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos turns around and finally notices the blood-covered Arch-Militant. Something about his servant seems to have puzzled him.{/n} "What's wrong with your eyes, Worten?" {n}The Arch-Militant bares his fangs rabidly. After several moments of silence, Calligos absent-mindedly looks away,{/n} "Where were we? Ah, yes, new blood. Have I already told you that your accusations are baseless?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos se détourne et remarque enfin l'archimilitant couvert de sang. Quelque chose dans le regard de son serviteur semble le rendre perplexe.{/n} « Que t'arrive-t-il, Worten ? Tes yeux sont étranges. » {n}L'archimilitant montre les dents comme un animal enragé. Après quelques instants de silence, Calligos regarde ailleurs, l'air absent :{/n} « Où en étions-nous ? Ah, oui... Novice, vous ai-je déjà dit que vos accusations étaient infondées ? »

languages.text: {n}カリゴスは背を向け、ようやく血まみれのアーク・ミリタントに気づく。己のしもべの何かが彼を戸惑わせているようだ。{/n}「その目はどういうことだ、ヴォルテン？」{n}アーク・ミリタントは牙を剥き出しにして狂気の笑みを浮かべる。しばらくの沈黙の後、カリゴスはぼんやりと目をそらす。{/n}「どうなってる？ああ、そうだ。新米よ、お前の非難に根拠がないことはもう言ったか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos turns around and finally notices the blood-covered Arch-Militant. Something about his servant seems to have puzzled him.{/n} "What's wrong with your eyes, Worten?" {n}The Arch-Militant bares his fangs rabidly. After several moments of silence, Calligos absent-mindedly looks away,{/n} "Where were we? Ah, yes, new blood. Have I already told you that your accusations are baseless?"

traits.locale_text: {n}カリゴスは背を向け、ようやく血まみれのアーク・ミリタントに気づく。己のしもべの何かが彼を戸惑わせているようだ。{/n}「その目はどういうことだ、ヴォルテン？」{n}アーク・ミリタントは牙を剥き出しにして狂気の笑みを浮かべる。しばらくの沈黙の後、カリゴスはぼんやりと目をそらす。{/n}「どうなってる？ああ、そうだ。新米よ、お前の非難に根拠がないことはもう言ったか？」

languages.text: {n}Calligos wendet sich ab und bemerkt endlich den blutverschmierten Erzmilitanten. Irgendetwas an seinem Diener scheint ihn zu irritieren.{/n} "Was stimmt mit Euren Augen nicht, Worten?" {n}Der Erzmilitant fletscht wütend seine Zähne. Nach kurzem Schweigen wendet Calligos geistesabwesend seinen Blick ab:{/n} "Wo waren wir? Ah, ja, neues Blut. Habe ich Euch schon gesagt, dass Eure Anschuldigungen haltlos sind?"
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos turns around and finally notices the blood-covered Arch-Militant. Something about his servant seems to have puzzled him.{/n} "What's wrong with your eyes, Worten?" {n}The Arch-Militant bares his fangs rabidly. After several moments of silence, Calligos absent-mindedly looks away,{/n} "Where were we? Ah, yes, new blood. Have I already told you that your accusations are baseless?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos wendet sich von dir ab und bemerkt schließlich den blutbeschmierten Erzmilitant. Der Blick seines Dieners verwirrt ihn.{/n} "Was stimmt mit Euren Augen nicht, Worten? {n}Der Erzmilitant grinst wild und fletscht seine Zähne. Nach mehreren Augenblicken des Schweigens wendet Calligos geistesabwesend den Blick ab:{/n} "Wo waren wir? Ah, ja, neues Blut. Habe ich Euch bereits gesagt, dass Eure Anschuldigungen haltlos sind?"

languages.text: {n}Calligos, arkasını dönüyor ve en nihayetinde kana bulanmış Başmilitan'ı fark ediyor. Hizmetkârıyla ilgili bir şeyler, kafasını karıştırmış gibi görünüyor.{/n} "Gözlerine ne oldu Worten?" {n}Başmilitan, vahşi bir şekilde dişlerini gösteriyor. Sessizlikle geçen dakikaların ardından Calligos, dalgın bir biçimde bakışlarını çeviriyor.{/n} "Neredeyiz biz? Doğru ya, taze kan... Sana suçlamalarının asılsız olduğunu söylemiş miydim?"
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos turns around and finally notices the blood-covered Arch-Militant. Something about his servant seems to have puzzled him.{/n} "What's wrong with your eyes, Worten?" {n}The Arch-Militant bares his fangs rabidly. After several moments of silence, Calligos absent-mindedly looks away,{/n} "Where were we? Ah, yes, new blood. Have I already told you that your accusations are baseless?"
